description: Isolated Synechococcus cultures frequently contain associated heterotrophic bacteria, and present a good and relevant research system to investigate the interactions of photoautotrophs-heterotrophs. Metagenomic sequences from microbial community co-cultured with a Synechococcus XM-24.
study_title: Synechococcus and Synechococcus-associated heterotrophic bacteria genome sequencing
